EmailTemplate.subject: Limited Inventory: UH-60 ATS Upgrade

<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Take Advantage of S3 International -10 ATS Upgrade for Blackhawks Don’t miss the opportunity to upgrade your Air Turbine Starter with S3 International’s -10 ATS Upgrade for Blackhawks.
Every mission requires unparalleled power, dependability and resilience. S3 International has partnered with Honeywell to bring you a top of the line upgrade for your UH-60.
So, upgrade today and stay mission ready at a moment's notice!
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/S3-UH60.html?utm_medium=Email&utm_source=Email&utm_campaign=18_channelamericas_D&S]]>
